articles.title: Xenoblade dev Monolith Soft says it will never be satisfied with the status quo, wants to aim for higher quality - Nintendo Everything

articles.title: Hue accidentally leaks a new video doorbell - The Verge
articles.description: An update to the Hue app this week added instructions to install an unannounced “Secure doorbell” product if you’re missing the QR code.
